ratMessagehe:
Come with me to the rat house
he has taken your yarn ball there
onecs: Rat has kept the yarn balls in his safe inside the house
twocs: To open that safe you will need a passcode
threecs: The passcode is present in pieces in all the rooms
fourcs: Go to each room and collect the passcode to open the safe
fivecs: Hope you find the yarn balls
controlInstruction:
Use UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT arrow keys for movement. Press ENTER to perform actions
like entering room and picking items.
sizePrefInstruction:
Try different sizes using UP and DOWN buttons. Press ENTER after making
the selection to get the passcode.
colorPrefInstruction:
Try different themes using UP and DOWN buttons. Press ENTER after making
the selection to get the passcode.
